content: I'm counting on you then! It's just those few boxes in front of the Camp, plus two near Captain Mo. No worries, I'm almost done here!
info: 整理营地-格连闲聊_主流程文本

content: <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, just a moment! I'll have these things moved to the right spot in no time. <style=SizeSmall>These boxes look so tast—uh, stackable. Yep.</style>
info: 整理营地-格连闲聊_主流程文本

content: Starting fresh here, I hope I can get you—and everyone else—the comfiest shoes around!
info: 整理营地-格连闲聊_主流程文本

content: {A笑眯眯}I heard this from a traveling merchant when I was little and jotted it down on the first page of my notebook.
info: 整理营地-格连闲聊_主流程文本

content: While applying to open the shop, I learned a lot of new things about certificates, business licenses, and fire safety...
info: 整理营地-格连闲聊_主流程文本

content: M-Moving boxes... {A想到了}That's just the first step of becoming a merchant! With this fresh start, you'll need to buy a whole load of stuff.
info: 整理营地-格连闲聊_主流程文本

content: If we stack them up, we can save some space. {A想象中}Mhm, like this... Just put this one up here, nice and steady... STEADY! {短暂停}Alright, on to the next one!
info: 整理营地-格连闲聊_主流程文本

content: "The best shoes are those that are most comfortable, not the most expensive ones."
info: 整理营地-格连闲聊_主流程文本

content: {A点头}All the goods and daily necessities must be carefully packed in the most chewable—n-no... D-Durable boxes!
info: 整理营地-格连闲聊_主流程文本

content: But that also means I'll have to ask you to unbox them one by one!
info: 整理营地-格连闲聊_主流程文本

content: Don't you want to open them yourself?
info: 整理营地-格连闲聊_主流程文本

content: As a <style=Highlight>Loomi Co.</style> coordinator, I'm here to help facilitate the circulation of goods between different locations.
info: 整理营地-格连闲聊_主流程文本

content: You're in charge of moving boxes?
info: 整理营地-格连闲聊_主流程文本

content: Just like Captain Mo said, even setbacks are a form of development! {A豆豆眼}Hm? So... how many times have I developed? <style=SizeSmall>Uh... well... that's...</style>
info: 整理营地-格连闲聊_主流程文本

content: I've also got my business license all taken care of! {A开心}You can leave all the buying, selling, and deliveries to me!
info: 整理营地-格连闲聊_主流程文本

content: N-No, you go ahead. {A不好意思}Everyone has their forte, and I... I'm more suited for stacking boxes! <style=SizeSmall>Must not gnaw! Hold back! Hold back!</style>
info: 整理营地-格连闲聊_主流程文本
